00049 
00055   ssize_t
00056   et_socket_read(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n, int *errnop, bool *eofp) {
00057     size_t nleft = n;
00058     ssize_t nread;
00059     char *ptr = (char *)vptr;
00060 
00061     while (nleft > 0) {
00062       if ((nread = ::read(fd, ptr, nleft)) < 0) {
00063         if (errno == EINTR) {
00064           nread = 0; /* and call read() again */
00065           continue;
00066         }
00067         *errnop = errno;
00068 
00069         if (*errnop == EAGAIN || nleft < n)
00070           break;     /* already read something, most likely EAGAIN */
00071 
00072         return -1;   /* other errors and nothing read */
00073       }
00074       else if (nread == 0) {
00075         *eofp = true;
00076         break;
00077       }
00078 
00079       nleft -= nread;
00080       ptr   += nread;
00081     }
00082     return n - nleft;
00083   }
00084 
00085   ssize_t
00086   et_socket_writev(int fd, const iovec *vector, int count, int *errnop) {
00087     ssize_t nwritten;
00088     while ((nwritten = ::writev(fd, vector, count)) <= 0) {
00089       if (errno == EINTR) {
00090         nwritten = 0; /* and call write() again */
00091         continue;
00092       }
00093       *errnop = errno;
00094       return -1;
00095     }
00096     return nwritten;
00097   }
00098

00102 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00103   int error = 0;
00104   bool eof = false;
00105 
00106   //DisplayEvent(event);
00107 
00108   try {
00109     if (event->events & EPOLLOUT) {
00110       if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00111         handle_disconnect();
00112         return true;
00113       }
00114     }
00115 
00116     if (event->events & EPOLLIN) {
00117       size_t nread;
00118       while (true) {
00119         if (!m_got_header) {
00120           nread = et_socket_read(m_sd, m_message_header_ptr,
00121                                  m_message_header_remaining, &error, &eof);
00122           if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00123             if (errno != ECONNREFUSED) {
00124               HT_ERRORF("socket read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00125                         (int)m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00126               error = Error::OK;
00127             }
00128             else
00129               error = Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR;
00130 
00131             handle_disconnect(error);
00132             return true;
00133           }
00134           else if (nread < m_message_header_remaining) {
00135             m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00136             m_message_header_ptr += nread;
00137             if (error == EAGAIN)
00138               break;
00139             error = 0;
00140           }
00141           else {
00142             m_message_header_ptr += nread;
00143             handle_message_header();
00144           }
00145 
00146           if (eof)
00147             break;
00148         }
00149         else { // got header
00150           nread = et_socket_read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining,
00151                                  &error, &eof);
00152           if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00153             HT_ERRORF("socket read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00154                       (int)m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00155             handle_disconnect();
00156             return true;
00157           }
00158           else if (nread < m_message_remaining) {
00159             m_message_ptr += nread;
00160             m_message_remaining -= nread;
00161             if (error == EAGAIN)
00162               break;
00163             error = 0;
00164           }
00165           else
00166             handle_message_body();
00167 
00168           if (eof)
00169             break;
00170         }
00171       }
00172     }
00173 
00174 #if defined(HT_EPOLLET)
00175     if (event->events & POLLRDHUP) {
00176       HT_DEBUGF("Received POLLRDHUP on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd,
00177                 inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00178       handle_disconnect();
00179       return true;
00180     }
00181 #else
00182     if (eof) {
00183       HT_DEBUGF("Received EOF on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd,
00184                 inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00185       handle_disconnect();
00186       return true;
00187     }
00188 #endif
00189 
00190     if (event->events & EPOLLERR) {
00191       HT_ERRORF("Received EPOLLERR on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd,
00192                 inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00193       handle_disconnect();
00194       return true;
00195     }
00196 
00197     if (event->events & EPOLLHUP) {
00198       HT_DEBUGF("Received EPOLLHUP on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd,
00199                 inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00200       handle_disconnect();
00201       return true;
00202     }
00203   }
00204   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00205     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00206     handle_disconnect();
00207     return true;
00208   }
00209 
00210   return false;
00211 }

00218 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct kevent *event) {
00219 
00220   //DisplayEvent(event);
00221 
00222   try {
00223     assert(m_sd == (int)event->ident);
00224 
00225     if (event->flags & EV_EOF) {
00226       handle_disconnect();
00227       return true;
00228     }
00229 
00230     if (event->filter == EVFILT_WRITE) {
00231       if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00232         handle_disconnect();
00233         return true;
00234       }
00235     }
00236 
00237     if (event->filter == EVFILT_READ) {
00238       size_t available = (size_t)event->data;
00239       size_t nread;
00240       while (available > 0) {
00241         if (!m_got_header) {
00242           if (m_message_header_remaining <= available) {
00243             nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_header_ptr,
00244                                     m_message_header_remaining);
00245             if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00246               HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00247                         (int)m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00248               handle_disconnect();
00249               return true;
00250             }
00251             assert(nread == m_message_header_remaining);
00252             available -= nread;
00253             m_message_header_ptr += nread;
00254             handle_message_header();
00255           }
00256           else {
00257             nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_header_ptr, available);
00258             if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00259               HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00260                         (int)available, strerror(errno));
00261               handle_disconnect();
00262               return true;
00263             }
00264             assert(nread == available);
00265             m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00266             m_message_header_ptr += nread;
00267             return false;
00268           }
00269         }
00270         if (m_got_header) {
00271           if (m_message_remaining <= available) {
00272             nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining);
00273             if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00274               HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00275                         (int)m_message_remaining, strerror(errno));
00276               handle_disconnect();
00277               return true;
00278             }
00279             assert(nread == m_message_remaining);
00280             available -= nread;
00281             handle_message_body();
00282           }
00283           else {
00284             nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, available);
00285             if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00286               HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00287                         (int)available, strerror(errno));
00288               handle_disconnect();
00289               return true;
00290             }
00291             assert(nread == available);
00292             m_message_ptr += nread;
00293             m_message_remaining -= nread;
00294             available = 0;
00295           }
00296         }
00297       }
00298     }
00299   }
00300   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00301     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00302     handle_disconnect();
00303     return true;
00304   }
00305 
00306 
00307   return false;
00308 }
00309 #else
00310   ImplementMe;
00311 #endif

00313 
00314 void IOHandlerData::handle_message_header() {
00315   size_t header_len = (size_t)m_message_header[1];
00316 
00317   // check to see if there is any variable length header
00318   // after the fixed length portion that needs to be read
00319   if (header_len > (size_t)(m_message_header_ptr - m_message_header)) {
00320     m_message_header_remaining = header_len - (size_t)(m_message_header_ptr
00321                                                        - m_message_header);
00322     return;
00323   }
00324 
00325   m_event->load_header(m_sd, m_message_header, header_len);
00326 
00327   m_message = new uint8_t [m_event->header.total_len - header_len];
00328   m_message_ptr = m_message;
00329   m_message_remaining = m_event->header.total_len - header_len;
00330   m_message_header_remaining = 0;
00331   m_got_header = true;
00332 
00333 }
00334 
00335 
00336 void IOHandlerData::handle_message_body() {
00337   DispatchHandler *dh = 0;
00338 
00339   if ((m_event->header.flags & CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) == 0 &&
00340       (m_event->header.id == 0
00341       || (dh = m_reactor_ptr->remove_request(m_event->header.id)) == 0)) {
00342     if ((m_event->header.flags & CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE) == 0) {
00343       HT_WARNF("Received response for non-pending event (id=%d,version"
00344                "=%d,total_len=%d)", m_event->header.id, m_event->header.version,
00345                m_event->header.total_len);
00346     }
00347     delete [] m_message;
00348     delete m_event;
00349   }
00350   else {
00351     m_event->payload = m_message;
00352     m_event->payload_len = m_event->header.total_len
00353                            - m_event->header.header_len;
00354     deliver_event( m_event, dh );
00355   }
00356 
00357   reset_incoming_message_state();
00358 }

00360 
00361 void IOHandlerData::handle_disconnect(int error) {
00362   m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00363   deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_addr, error));
00364 }

00367 bool IOHandlerData::handle_write_readiness() {
00368 
00369   if (m_connected == false) {
00370     socklen_t name_len = sizeof(m_local_addr);
00371     int sockerr = 0;
00372     socklen_t sockerr_len = sizeof(sockerr);
00373 
00374     if (getsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR, &sockerr, &sockerr_len) < 0) {
00375       HT_ERRORF("getsockopt(SO_ERROR) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00376     }
00377 
00378     if (sockerr) {
00379       HT_ERRORF("connect() completion error - %s", strerror(sockerr));
00380       return true;
00381     }
00382 
00383     int bufsize = 4*32768;
00384     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize,
00385         sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00386       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00387     }
00388     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize,
00389         sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00390       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (getsockname(m_sd, (struct sockaddr *)&m_local_addr, &name_len) < 0) {
00394       HT_ERRORF("getsockname(%d) failed - %s", m_sd, strerror(errno));
00395       return true;
00396     }
00397     //clog << "Connection established." << endl;
00398     m_connected = true;
00399     deliver_event(new Event(Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, m_addr,
00400                             Error::OK));
00401   }
00402   else {
00403     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00404     if (flush_send_queue() != Error::OK) {
00405       HT_DEBUG("error flushing send queue");
00406       return true;
00407     }
00408     if (m_send_queue.empty())
00409       remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00410   }
00411   return false;
00412 }

00414 
00415 int
00416 IOHandlerData::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00417                             DispatchHandler *disp_handler) {
00418   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00419   int error;
00420   bool initially_empty = m_send_queue.empty() ? true : false;
00421 
00422   HT_LOG_ENTER;
00423 
00424   // If request, Add message ID to request cache
00425   if (cbp->header.id != 0 && disp_handler != 0
00426       && cbp->header.flags & CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) {
00427     boost::xtime expire_time;
00428     boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00429     xtime_add_millis(expire_time, timeout_ms);
00430     m_reactor_ptr->add_request(cbp->header.id, this, disp_handler, expire_time);
00431   }
00432 
00433   m_send_queue.push_back(cbp);
00434 
00435   if ((error = flush_send_queue()) != Error::OK)
00436     return error;
00437 
00438   if (initially_empty && !m_send_queue.empty()) {
00439     add_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00440     //HT_INFO("Adding Write interest");
00441   }
00442   else if (!initially_empty && m_send_queue.empty()) {
00443     remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00444     //HT_INFO("Removing Write interest");
00445   }
00446 
00447   return Error::OK;
00448 }

00452 #if defined(__linux__)
00453 
00454 int IOHandlerData::flush_send_queue() {
00455   ssize_t nwritten, towrite, remaining;
00456   struct iovec vec[2];
00457   int count;
00458   int error = 0;
00459 
00460   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00461 
00462     CommBufPtr &cbp = m_send_queue.front();
00463 
00464     count = 0;
00465     towrite = 0;
00466     remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00467     if (remaining > 0) {
00468       vec[0].iov_base = (void *)cbp->data_ptr;
00469       vec[0].iov_len = remaining;
00470       towrite = remaining;
00471       ++count;
00472     }
00473     if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00474       remaining = cbp->ext.size - (cbp->ext_ptr - cbp->ext.base);
00475       if (remaining > 0) {
00476         vec[count].iov_base = (void *)cbp->ext_ptr;
00477         vec[count].iov_len = remaining;
00478         towrite += remaining;
00479         ++count;
00480       }
00481     }
00482 
00483     nwritten = et_socket_writev(m_sd, vec, count, &error);
00484     if (nwritten == (ssize_t)-1) {
00485       if (error == EAGAIN)
00486         return Error::OK;
00487       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, (int)towrite,
00488                strerror(errno));
00489       return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00490     }
00491     else if (nwritten < towrite) {
00492       if (nwritten == 0) {
00493         if (error == EAGAIN)
00494           break;
00495         if (error) {
00496           HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd,
00497                    (int)towrite, strerror(error));
00498           return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00499         }
00500         continue;
00501       }
00502       remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00503       if (remaining > 0) {
00504         if (nwritten < remaining) {
00505           cbp->data_ptr += nwritten;
00506           if (error == EAGAIN)
00507             break;
00508           error = 0;
00509           continue;
00510         }
00511         else {
00512           nwritten -= remaining;
00513           cbp->data_ptr += remaining;
00514         }
00515       }
00516       if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00517         cbp->ext_ptr += nwritten;
00518         if (error == EAGAIN)
00519           break;
00520         error = 0;
00521         continue;
00522       }
00523     }
00524 
00525     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (destroys buffer)
00526     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00527   }
00528 
00529   return Error::OK;
00530 }
00531 
00532 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00533 
00534 int IOHandlerData::flush_send_queue() {
00535   ssize_t nwritten, towrite, remaining;
00536   struct iovec vec[2];
00537   int count;
00538 
00539   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00540 
00541     CommBufPtr &cbp = m_send_queue.front();
00542 
00543     count = 0;
00544     towrite = 0;
00545     remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00546     if (remaining > 0) {
00547       vec[0].iov_base = (void *)cbp->data_ptr;
00548       vec[0].iov_len = remaining;
00549       towrite = remaining;
00550       ++count;
00551     }
00552     if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00553       remaining = cbp->ext.size - (cbp->ext_ptr - cbp->ext.base);
00554       if (remaining > 0) {
00555         vec[count].iov_base = (void *)cbp->ext_ptr;
00556         vec[count].iov_len = remaining;
00557         towrite += remaining;
00558         ++count;
00559       }
00560     }
00561 
00562     nwritten = FileUtils::writev(m_sd, vec, count);
00563     if (nwritten == (ssize_t)-1) {
00564       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, (int)towrite,
00565                strerror(errno));
00566       return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00567     }
00568     else if (nwritten < towrite) {
00569       if (nwritten == 0)
00570         break;
00571       remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00572       if (remaining > 0) {
00573         if (nwritten < remaining) {
00574           cbp->data_ptr += nwritten;
00575           break;
00576         }
00577         else {
00578           nwritten -= remaining;
00579           cbp->data_ptr += remaining;
00580         }
00581       }
00582       if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00583         cbp->ext_ptr += nwritten;
00584         break;
00585       }
00586     }
00587 
00588     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (destroys buffer)
00589     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00590   }
00591 
00592   return Error::OK;
00593 }
